mapper.select: select t1.*, t2.role_name, t3.company_name from T_USER_INFO t1 left join T_ROLE t2 on t2.role_id = t1.role_id left join T_USER_COMPANY t3 on t3.company_id = t1.user_company WHERE t1.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.USER_PWD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t1.USER_STATE = '1'

SELECT t1.menu_id, t1.menu_name, t1.path, t1.menu_pid, t1.iconpath, t1.menu_order FROM T_MENU t1, T_MENU_ROLE t2 where t1.menu_id = t2.menu_id and t2.role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MENU_ORDER
SELECT t1.* FROM T_COUNTRY t1 LEFT JOIN T_COUNTRY t2 ON t2.COUNTRY_TYPE = t1.COUNTRY_TYPE WHERE t2.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ADDRESS SET USERNAME = #{ShippingFirstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY = #{ShippingCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{ShippingPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRYCODE = #{CountryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSTALCODE = #{ShippingZip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{ShippingCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATEORREGION = #{ShippingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSLINE1 = #{ShippingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSLINE2 = #{ShippingAddress1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESSLINE3 = #{ShippingAddress2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE AMAZONORDERID = #{amazonOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
